column2: RED KEEP - TOMMEN’S CHAMBER TOMMEN is being dressed by an attendant
RED KEEP - MARGAERY’S CHAMBER MARGAERY is being dressed by a handmaiden
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - PRAYER ROOM The HIGH SPARROW dresses himself in a roughspun tunic, sliding his hands through the sleeves one by one
RED KEEP - TOMMEN’S CHAMBER The attendant places a large golden necklace around TOMMEN’s neck
RED KEEP - MARGAERY’S CHAMBER The handmaiden finishes tying MARGAERY’s dress and fixes her hair
RED KEEP - TOMMEN’S CHAMBER The attendant places TOMMEN’s crown on top of his head
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR A pair of Faith Militant men open the main door to the Sept
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - LORAS’ CELL LORAS sits in the back of his cell, muttering to himself
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR The HIGH SPARROW and six other septons enter
RED KEEP - TOMMEN’s CHAMBER TOMMEN is sitting in a chair in the center of the room, looking out the window
Your Grace
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER A handmaiden connects a golden chain between two golden shoulder fastenings on CERSEI’s dress
RED KEEP - TOMMEN’S CHAMBER TOMMEN says nothing
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER The handmaiden places a ring on CERSEI’s middle finger
RED KEEP - MAESTER PYCELLE’S CHAMBER PYCELLE is standing in front of a bureau
Grand Maester
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR LANCEL and a group of Faith Militant usher LORAS into the sept and down the steps
Ser Loras Tyrell

column1: Are you prepared to stand trial and profess your guilt or innocence before the Seven? LORAS
column2: There’ll be no need for a trial
I perjured myself before the gods
The gods’ judgment is fierce, but also fair
I take full responsibility for my many sins and unburden myself of my desires
Brother Loras… LORAS begins to cry
No, I can’t let them… MARGAERY blocks her father with her arm
Faith is the way, Father
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER The handmaiden finishes dressing CERSEI and steps away from her
RED KEEP - TOMMEN’S CHAMBER Someone approaches TOMMEN
All right
I have to go, I’m-- I’m late for the trial
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER The handmaiden exits
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR The Faith Militant has finished carving LORAS’s forehead
You mutilated him
I’ve kept my word
It appears the queen mother doesn’t wish to attend her own trial
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER CERSEI pours herself a glass of wine
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER CERSEI walks to the balcony with her glass of wine
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - STEPS LANCEL emerges onto the steps with the Faith Militant
Get the others
RED KEEP - QYBURN’S LAB The young girl opens the door and leads PYCELLE inside
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - STEPS LANCEL runs to the door the boy entered and then goes inside
RED KEEP - QYBURN’S LAB PYCELLE walks down the steps and into the lab, then turns around to see QYBURN sitting in a chair behind him
Where’s the king? QYBURN stands
Elsewhere, I’m afraid
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - TUNNELS LANCEL continues to follow the boy through the tunnels
RED KEEP - QYBURN’S LAB More children brandishing knives appear
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - TUNNELS LANCEL runs down the tunnel after the boy
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - TUNNELS LANCEL turns a corner and finds a smaller tunnel
RED KEEP - QYBURN’S LAB The children converge on PYCELLE
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - TUNNELS LANCEL happens upon the boy’s torch and raises it up
The longer you wait, the worse it’ll be for you
What are you doing? The boy runs away
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR The crowd is murmuring
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - TUNNELS LANCEL looks down the tunnel and sees a glimmer of light
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER CERSEI is standing at the balcony, staring out at the Great Sept of Baelor
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR MARGAERY looks around
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - TUNNELS LANCEL crawls closer to the other end of the hall
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR MARGAERY hurries over to the HIGH SPARROW
There’s something wrong
You have nothing to fear, Your Grace
Cersei is not here

column1: Why do you think they are not here? HIGH SPARROW
column2: If the accused is not here, she will be tried regardless

column1: We cannot escape the justice of the gods-- MARGAERY
column2: Forget about the bloody gods and listen to what I’m telling you
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - TUNNELS LANCEL has almost reached the end of the tunnel
Loras
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - TUNNELS LANCEL groans as he pulls himself closer to the candles
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR MARGAERY hurries towards the exit with LORAS
Let me through
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR MARGAERY looks over her shoulder at the HIGH SPARROW
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - TUNNELS The flame from the candle touches the pool of green liquid and ignites it
GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR The sound of an explosion can be heard
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER CERSEI watches the explosion
RED KEEP - TOMMEN’S CHAMBER GREGOR is standing in the hallway
RED KEEP - UNKNOWN CHAMBER SEPTA UNELLA is lying strapped to a table
Confess
No
Confess
Confess
You’ve always been quiet
I said my face would be the last thing you saw before you died
Good
What? Now? Today? You’re not going to die today
This is Ser Gregor Clegane
Your gods have forsaken you
No
Shame
Shame
Shame
RED KEEP - TOMMEN’S CHAMBER TOMMEN is staring out the window
I’m very sorry, Your Grace
May we stand together through the centuries, good friends to the last
And when we drive our swords through our enemies’ hearts, may we speak the words of our alliance, “The Freys and the Lannisters send their regards
You don’t even have to do anything, do you? JAIME looks at the handmaiden
You just sit there, a rich slab of beef, and all the birds come pecking
You’re welcome to her
She doesn’t want me
Those two have their eyes on you
They have their eyes on you, cunt
Not my type
There you go
Maybe I’m not in the mood
Fuck it
No need to call me ser just because I’m an anointed knight
This came together rather well
I’m sure he would be
Edmure is back in a cell
So the famous Blackfish killed by footsoldiers, eh? Legendary warrior, everyone said
No, but back in your day
The purpose of fighting is defeating your enemies, isn’t it? JAIME nods
I’ve defeated mine
Yes, you’re a great conqueror
Go on, mock me, boy
They don’t fear the Freys, though
Show me
THE CITADEL SAM and GILLY enter and walk to the front desk
Hello
From Lord Commander Snow at Castle Black
I’m-- I’m to be the new maester
Oh
According to our records, Jeor Mormont is Lord Commander
He died
We received no report from the maester at Castle Black
Maester Aemon became quite ill shortly after the election
This is irregular
Yes, well, I suppose that life is irregular
The archmaester will discuss these irregularities with you
No women or children! The maester turns and walks away
WINTERFELL - DINING HALL JON SNOW is standing behind the high table, staring across the hall
When we had feasts, our family would sit up here… and I’d sit down there
Could have been worse, Jon Snow
Aye, you’re right
The Princess Shireen
Tell him what you did to her
We burned her at the stake
I loved that girl like she was my own
So did her father
The only way for what? They all died anyway! You told everyone Stannis was the one
I didn’t lie
Aye, you were wrong
I ask your leave to execute this woman for murder
Ride south today
If you ever come back this way, I will execute you myself
WINTERFELL - OUTER WALL JON SNOW stands atop the outer wall watching MELISANDRE ride south on her horse
I’m having the lord’s chamber prepared for you
Mother and Father’s room? You should take it
I’m not a Stark
You are to me
You’re the Lady of Winterfell
He did
We need to trust each other
Jon
A raven came from the Citadel
Well, Father always promised, didn’t he? JON SNOW exits
The last time a Tyrell came to Dorne, he was assassinated
You have nothing to fear from us, Lady Olenna
Obara
Forgive my sister

column1: What she lacks in diplomacy, she makes-- OLENNA
column2: Do shut up, dear
Anything from you? TYENE opens her mouth to speak
No? Good
The Lannisters have declared war on House Tyrell
Cersei stole the future from me
You’re absolutely right
Fire and blood
Your ships are nearly ready
I’m curious to see how the Dothraki do on the poison water
You’re not coming with us
New strategy? You want the Second Sons to attack from the west coast? If we take Casterly Rock, the Lannisters will have nowhere to run when you hit King’s Landing
You’re not going to Westeros
Fuck Meereen
You promised me
A king wouldn’t think twice about it
I love you
I can’t
The dwarf told you to do this
No one tells me to do anything
Clever fellow
Don’t get angry
I’m not angry

column1: Who comes after you? Who can ever follow Daenerys Stormborn, the Mother of Dragons? DAENERYS
column2: A great number of women, I imagine
I pity the lord of Westeros
Farewell, Daario Naharis
MEEREEN - GREAT PYRAMID THRONE ROOM TYRION is sitting off to the side of the room on a bench
I know it was hard for you
It’s not
No, I suppose not
Yes, you really are
All right, how about the fact that this is actually happening? You have your armies, you have your ships, you have your dragons
Good
Do you know what frightens me? I said farewell to a man who loves me
He wasn’t the first to love you and he won’t be the last
Well, you have completely failed to console me
For what it’s worth, I’ve been a cynic for as long as I can remember
I believe in you
It’s your counsel I need
It’s yours
Good
Tyrion Lannister, I name you Hand of the Queen
Didn’t think so
Where are my damn moron sons? Black Walder and Lothar promised to be here by midday
They’re here, my lord
Well, what are they doing, trimming their cunt hairs? Tell them to come here now
But they’re already here, my lord
Here, my lord
They weren’t easy to carve
What… The handmaiden reaches up to her face and pulls it away, revealing her true identity is ARYA
My name is Arya Stark
Forgive me, my lady… if you’re at prayer
I’m done with all that
I was a stupid girl
You were a child
I was wrong
No, you weren’t
It’s a pretty picture
News of this battle will spread quickly through the Seven Kingdoms
You’ve declared for other houses before, Lord Baelish
The past is gone for good
This is where I leave you
Thank you, Uncle Benjen
I wish you both good fortune
Is that you? Is that really you? LYANNA lifts her hand
You’re not a dream
No, I’m not a dream
I’ve missed you, big brother
I’ve missed you, too
I want to be brave
Shh
I’m not
I don’t want to die
You’re not going to die
If Robert finds out, he’ll kill him, you know he will
Promise me, Ned
You can’t expect Knights of the Vale to side with wildling invaders
We didn’t invade
Not by me
The free folk, the northerners, and the Knights of the Vale fought bravely, fought together, and we won
The Boltons are defeated
The war is not over
Your son was butchered at the Red Wedding, Lord Manderly
Lady Mormont speaks harshly and truly
I did not fight beside you on the field and I will regret that until my dying day
There’s nothing to forgive, my lord
There will be more fights to come
The King in the North! Everyone in the hall stands and draws their blades
The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! JON SNOW stands
Come on
RED KEEP - THRONE ROOM CERSEI enters, escorted by GREGOR and the Kingsguard
I now proclaim Cersei of the House Lannister First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms
Long may she reign
Long may she reign
